title: Bug 4329: No results when searching via Package view selection and dialog (1GLDN1X)
description: Bug 4329: No results are displayed when searching via Package view selection and dialog (1GLDN1X)
OB: When searching for declarations using the search function in the Package view selection and dialog, no results are returned.
EB: Searching via the context menu in the Packages view works correctly.
SR: The search function in the Package view selection and dialog should first attempt to get the Java element and, if that fails, display the element name instead of the fully qualified name.
